org.eclipse.jetty.spdy.api

Class Headers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.spdy.api.Headers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Headers.Header>

    public class Headers
extends Object
implements Iterable<Headers.Header>

    A container for name/value pairs, known as headers.

    A Headers.Header is composed of a case-insensitive name string and of a case-sensitive set of value strings.

    The implementation of this class is not thread safe.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Headers.Header
      A named list of string values.
